title: Understanding Substance Use Disorders
text: Substance use disorders (SUD) involve the repeated use of substances like alcohol or drugs, which can lead to significant health issues and affect daily responsibilities.

hintAnswer: repeated use of alcohol and/or other drugs significantly impairs a person’s health and results in an inability for them to meet major responsibilities at work, school, or home
title: Characteristics of SUD
text: What are the key characteristics of substance use disorders?
choices: repeated use of alcohol and/or other drugs significantly impairs a person’s health and results in an inability for them to meet major responsibilities at work, school, or home
a psychoactive compound with the potential for dependence and detrimental effects
the person begins to feel physical or emotional upset when they are not using a substance
